email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel available, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.75 per ton, which is competitive given the current market. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $48.75 per ton is acceptable. However, we’d like to request a laycan adjustment to October 16-21 to align with our loading schedule. Also, could you confirm the cargo size capacity? Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, glad to hear the rate works for you. The laycan adjustment to October 16-21 is confirmed. The vessel can accommodate up to 140,000 tons of crude oil. I’ll send over the fixture recap shortly for your review. Let me know if there’s anything else. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. The cargo size and laycan look good. Please proceed with the fixture recap, and we’ll review it promptly. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Cheers, John
